ygData.subject: Too much EQ (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Been reading this list since digest #50, figured I ve spent way too much time at it. I ve enjoyed many of the threads here, disliked some of the bickering.
ygData.messageBody:
Been reading this list since digest #50, figured I've spent way too much time at it. I've enjoyed many of the threads here, disliked some of the bickering.

Thought I'd post a couple Signs you've been playing to much EQ as posted to our guild message board by two members, maybe you'll get a grin:

1. You have to squelch a cry of "Griff" when you catch a glimpse of a low-flying small aircraft.

2. You mutter "Why don't people loot their kills" as you pass a dead animal on the side of the road.

3. You finally camp for the night, and reaching your bedroom, say "Hail, a irate spouse".

DejaThoris
--

4) When your spouse enters the room and sees you at the computer, she automatically cons red and "poised ready to attack - what would you like your tombstone to say?"

5) You know the family pet will give you no exp, but you really need a pair of fur-lined gloves.....

Silmaril
--

On another note I'm just about to get Lullaby and I fight in large groups whenever possible, what song combo would you suggest? (I've got full banded, snakeskin gloves & mask and a dragoon dirk)

Lakosh
Bard of the 14th Chord
Tunare
